**Example 1: 停止任务**



Input: 

```
tccli pts AbortJob --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId project-btksohr0 \
    --ScenarioId scenario-j1u85ixm \
    --JobId job-61ovraba \
    --AbortReason 1
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "70805f6a-d7e1-4247-9d5a-fde3afe2b377"
    }
}
```
